name: Haus Oblasser
description: Our house is situated in the quiet sub district of Stillupklamm.
The price includes electricity, heating, water, towels, bed linen, bread delivery service and local taxes. Excludes a final cleaning charge!
Directions: Stay on the Mayrhofen ring road (the Umfahrungsstrasse) until the turn off for "Hintertux", carry straight on and we are the 5th house on the left (approx. another 50 metres).

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Self contained apartment, approx. 70mÂ² with kitchen/living room, 2 separate bedrooms - bedroom with 3 beds and a double bedroom with shower/WC, 2 balconies, Sat-TV!
